# ethord
## The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package

<!-- badges: start -->

[![License: CC BY
4.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-CC_BY_4.0-lightgrey.svg)](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

<!-- badges: end -->

Metadata relative to each project funded by the Open Research Data (ORD) initiative by swissuniversities.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ethord from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("openwashdata/ethord")
```
